alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:33PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Johnson County through 500 PM MDT... At 433 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Buffalo, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Johnson County. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between mile markers 284 and 291. Interstate 90 between mile markers 66 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
